headline: Altria Holds 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders; Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend of $1.02 Per Share

headline: Dividend Harvesting Portfolio Week 219: $21,900 Allocated, $2,206.52 In Projected Dividends
summary: Expect market gains in late 2025 as CPI trends lower. See how strategic dividend reinvesting drives income growth and diversification for long-term success.
